snippet: Troops moved in after radical settlers clashed with soldiers and destroyed army property at the Od Yosef Chai Yeshiva in the Jewish settlement of Yitzhar.
abstract: Israeli military takes over seminary known for extremism in the Jewish settlement of Yitzhar in the West Bank, moving in a company of border police troops after radical settlers clashed with soldiers and destroyed army property.
lead_paragraph: Troops moved in after radical settlers clashed with soldiers and destroyed army property at the Od Yosef Chai Yeshiva in the Jewish settlement of Yitzhar.

headline.main: Israeli Military Takes Over Seminary in West Bank Settlement
headline.print_headline: Israeli Military Takes Over Seminary in West Bank Settlement
